overview: When her sibling Zara suffers a nervous breakdown, the introvert Eva is forced to take on Zaraâ€™s job as a Foley artist. She struggles to create sounds for a commercial featuring a horse, and then a horsetail starts growing out of her body. Empowered by her tail, she lures a botanist into an affair, through a game of submission. Piaffe is a visceral journey into control, gender, and artifice.
title: Piaffe
